author: cmpilato
msg: Add r14345 and r14150 to the 'mailer.py change' list, and reset votes.

author: cmpilato
msg: Fix some bugs and maintenance burdens in mailer.py.
Thanks to Tobias Ringström <tobias@ringstrom.mine.nu> for the bug
reports.  Thanks to that ache at the base of my skull that shows up
anytime I find myself working too hard to maintain software for the
other fixes.
* tools/hook-scripts/mailer/mailer.py
(main): Lose 'rev', 'propname', 'action', and 'author', in favor of
a generic cmd_args list, and wield that sucker accordingly.
(PropChange.generate): Use 'self.action', not 'action'.
(Lock.__init__): Use the first full path (not relative one) to fetch
our lock comment.
(Lock.generate): Indent paths three spaces (like Commit does).
Also, if there's no lock comment, output an empty string (instead of
letting Python print "None").
(__main__):  Rework the argument parsing stuff to make input sanity
checks more ... sane.  Update call to main().

author: dlr
msg: * www/project_tools.html
* www/NavColumn-ProjectToolsOverride.html
Add comments describing the use of these files.
Modern CEE installs use NavColumn-ProjectToolsOverride.html to
override portions of the left nav, but as of as of 2005-04-20,
tigris.org with CEE 3.5.0 isn't making use of this file.  It's
believed that this is legacy from Days of Yore, from before this
type of overrides had been productized into CEE.
See www/overrides/snippets/README in the "look" project for details.
Reported by: maxb

author: ringstrom
msg: * STATUS: Veto r14205, r14208 (mailer.py lock/unlock support).

author: maxb
msg: * www/project_issues.html: Restore the yellowness to our Issue Tracker yellow
box, and make it a slightly more yellow less cream colour than before.
